summary: The Access to Prescription Digital Therapeutics Act of 2025 aims to amend the Social Security Act to provide coverage for prescription digital therapeutics (PDTs) under Medicare and Medicaid. It defines PDTs, outlines coverage as a medical service effective January 1, 2026, and mandates the Secretary to establish payment methodologies, product-specific HCPCS codes, and manufacturer reporting requirements. Penalties are included for manufacturers who fail to properly report. The bill also includes PDTs in the Medicaid program.
